@BrainMaps_Delineation.Comments:
In the literature, many authors are not aware of the differences between between B05 and B09. Unfortunately, Brodmann himslef misleadingly implies that in B09 the map of B05 was simply reproduced (see legend to Figs. 90, 91). However, in B09 new areas 32, 35, and 43 are defined that were formerly not known by B05.
Further confusion is often caused by areas 25 and 43 which are not shown by the map (Figs. 90, 91 in B09) but are defined in the text (p. 154, 159).
